title: Google\Cloud\AutoMl\V1\TextSegment
name: TextSegment
description:
A contiguous part of a text (string), assuming it has an UTF-8 NFC encoding.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.automl.v1.TextSegment

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.content
params.description: Output only. The content of the TextSegment.

params.name: data.start_offset
params.description: Required. Zero-based character index of the first character of the text segment (counting characters from the beginning of the text).

params.name: data.end_offset
params.description: Required. Zero-based character index of the first character past the end of the text segment (counting character from the beginning of the text). The character at the end_offset is NOT included in the text segment.

methods.description:
Output only. The content of the TextSegment.
